user.title: Add Octo Bed
user.description: Enter your Octo bed's Bluetooth address. With ESPHome Bluetooth proxy, use the bed's address (not the proxy).

confirm.title: Octo Bed found
confirm.description: Do you want to add the Octo Bed at {address}?

pin.title: Enter PIN
pin.description: The 4-digit PIN is required to establish a connection with your Octo bed. You can find this in your bed's manual or app.

error.invalid_address: Invalid Bluetooth address. Use format AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF (12 hex characters).
error.pin_rejected: The bed rejected this PIN. Check the PIN and try again.
error.device_unavailable: Device not reachable. Ensure the bed is on and in range (or Bluetooth proxy is connected).

error.invalid_range: Head and feet travel must be between 5 and 120 seconds.
